## ğŸ¨ **M3 Expressive åˆç‰ˆå¯¦ç¾é‡é»**

### **1. æƒ…æ„Ÿè‰²å½©ç³»çµ±**
- **æˆé•·ä¸»é¡Œ** (è²·å…¥å€) - ç¶ è‰²ç³»çµ±ï¼Œè±¡å¾µå¸Œæœ›èˆ‡æˆé•·
- **è¡Œå‹•ä¸»é¡Œ** (è³£å‡ºå€) - æ©˜è‰²ç³»çµ±ï¼Œè±¡å¾µæ±ºæ–·èˆ‡è¡Œå‹•
- **ä¸­æ€§ä¸»é¡Œ** (è³‡è¨Šå€) - ç´«è‰²ç³»çµ±ï¼Œä¿æŒå°ˆæ¥­æ„Ÿ

### **2. å½ˆæ€§å‹•ç•«ç³»çµ±**

### ğŸ¯ é—œéµè¨­è¨ˆç‰¹è‰²

#### **1. è‡ªå‹•è¨ˆç®—æ¬„ä½**

```sql
-- æ·¨æŠ•è³‡é‡‘é¡è‡ªå‹•è¨ˆç®—
net_amount DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (
    CASE 
        WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN gross_amount + total_fees
        WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN gross_amount - total_fees
    END
```

#### **2. å¤šå¹£åˆ¥æ”¯æ´**

- æ­·å²åŒ¯ç‡è¨˜éŒ„

### ğŸ“Š å ±è¡¨åˆ†æèƒ½åŠ›

#### **æŠ•è³‡ç¸¾æ•ˆåˆ†æ**
```sql
-- ç¸½æŠ•è³‡å ±é…¬ç‡
SELECT 
    market,
    SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END) as total_cost,
    SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END) as total_revenue,
    ((SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END) - 
      SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END)) / 
      SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END)) * 100 as roi_percentage
FROM stock_transactions 
GROUP BY market;
```

#### **æŒå€‰åˆ†æ**
```sql
-- ç›®å‰æŒè‚¡ç‹€æ³
SELECT 
    stock_code,
    stock_name,
    SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN shares ELSE -shares END) as current_shares,
    AVG(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN price_per_share END) as avg_cost
FROM stock_transactions 
GROUP BY stock_code, stock_name
HAVING current_shares > 0;
```

#### **æœˆåº¦æŠ•è³‡çµ±è¨ˆ**
```sql
-- æ¯æœˆæŠ•è³‡é‡‘é¡çµ±è¨ˆ
SELECT 
    strftime('%Y-%m', transaction_date) as month,
    transaction_type,
    COUNT(*) as transaction_count,
    SUM(net_amount) as total_amount
FROM stock_transactions 
GROUP BY month, transaction_type
ORDER BY month DESC;
```

å¥½çš„ï¼ç¾åœ¨æˆ‘æœ‰äº†å®Œæ•´çš„ç¾æœ‰æ¶æ§‹ç†è§£ã€‚è®“æˆ‘æŒ‰ç…§è¦ç¯„é–‹å§‹å¯¦ä½œSQLiteæ¶æ§‹ï¼Œç¢ºä¿ä¸ç ´å£ä»»ä½•ç¾æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

## æ­¥é©Ÿ1: ä¿®æ”¹å‰æª¢æŸ¥ âœ…

**ä¾è³´é—œä¿‚è­˜åˆ¥ï¼š**
- âœ… é ç±¤åˆ‡æ›ï¼š`data-tab` å±¬æ€§ã€`.navigation-tab` é¡åã€`showTab()` å‡½æ•¸

- âœ… æ•¸æ“šå­˜å„²ï¼šç¾æœ‰ `localStorage` æ©Ÿåˆ¶åœ¨ `storage.js`
- âœ… UIæ›´æ–°ï¼š`updateAllTablesAndSummary()` å‡½æ•¸ä¾è³´

**ç­–ç•¥ï¼š**

2. ä¿æŒç¾æœ‰LocalStorageä½œç‚ºå‚™ç”¨
3. ä½¿ç”¨é©é…å™¨æ¨¡å¼æ¼¸é€²æ•´åˆ

## æ­¥é©Ÿ2: ä¿®æ”¹åŸ·è¡Œ - å‰µå»ºSQLiteè³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹

ç¾åœ¨æˆ‘é–‹å§‹å‰µå»ºSQLiteè³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹ã€‚ç‚ºäº†ç¢ºä¿éµå®ˆè¦ç¯„ï¼Œæˆ‘æœƒï¼š
1. ä¿æŒæ‰€æœ‰ç¾æœ‰å‡½æ•¸ä¸è®Š

ç”±æ–¼æˆ‘ç›®å‰ç„¡æ³•ä½¿ç”¨æ–‡ä»¶å‰µå»ºå·¥å…·ï¼Œè®“æˆ‘æä¾›å®Œæ•´çš„SQLiteå¯¦ä½œæ¶æ§‹è¨­è¨ˆå’Œå…·é«”çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å…§å®¹ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥æ‰‹å‹•å‰µå»ºé€™äº›æª”æ¡ˆï¼š

## ğŸ—„ï¸ SQLite è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹å¯¦ä½œ

### 1. è³‡æ–™åº«è¡¨çµæ§‹è¨­è¨ˆ (`backend/database/schema.sql`)

```sql
-- ================================================
-- æŠ•è³‡è¿½è¹¤å™¨ SQLite è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹è¨­è¨ˆ
-- ================================================

-- ä½¿ç”¨è€…è¡¨
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
    user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default_user',
    email VARCHAR(100),
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆè¡¨
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS portfolios (
    portfolio_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    user_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    portfolio_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆ',
    base_currency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'TWD',
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

-- è‚¡ç¥¨äº¤æ˜“è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_transactions (
    transaction_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    
    -- åŸºæœ¬è³‡è¨Š
    market VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    stock_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    stock_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    
    -- äº¤æ˜“è©³æƒ…
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, -- 'BUY', 'SELL'
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    shares DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
    price_per_share DECIMAL(15,4) NOT NULL,
    
    -- è²»ç”¨
    commission_fee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    transaction_tax DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    
    -- è¨ˆç®—æ¬„ä½
    gross_amount DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (shares * price_per_share) STORED,
    net_amount DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (
        CASE 
            WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN (shares * price_per_share) + commission_fee
            WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN (shares * price_per_share) - commission_fee - transaction_tax
        END
    ) STORED,
    
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
);

-- åŸºé‡‘äº¤æ˜“è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fund_transactions (
    transaction_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    fund_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    nav DECIMAL(15,4) NOT NULL,
    units DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
    fee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
);

-- åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£äº¤æ˜“è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crypto_transactions (
    transaction_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    symbol VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    quantity DECIMAL(20,8) NOT NULL,
    price_twd DECIMAL(15,4) NOT NULL,
    fee_twd DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
);

-- æˆ¿åœ°ç”¢è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS property_records (
    property_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
    property_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    down_payment DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    loan_amount DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
    interest_rate DECIMAL(5,4),
    loan_term_years INTEGER,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
);

-- æˆ¿è²¸ç¹³æ¬¾è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mortgage_payments (
    payment_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    property_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    principal_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    interest_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_records(property_id)
);

-- ç´¢å¼•
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_stock_portfolio_date ON stock_transactions(portfolio_id, transaction_date);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_stock_code_date ON stock_transactions(stock_code, transaction_date);

-- åˆå§‹åŒ–è³‡æ–™
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO users (user_id, username) VALUES (1, 'default_user');
INSERT OR IGNORE INTO portfolios (portfolio_id, user_id, portfolio_name) VALUES (1, 1, 'ä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆ');
```

### 2. è³‡æ–™åº«æœå‹™å±¤ (`backend/database/databaseService.js`)

```javascript
const sequelize = require('./connection');
const { QueryTypes } = require('sequelize');

class DatabaseService {
    constructor() {
        this.sequelize = sequelize;
    }

    async initialize() {
        try {
            await this.sequelize.authenticate();
            console.log('Database connection established successfully.');
            
            // åŸ·è¡Œè³‡æ–™åº«åˆå§‹åŒ–è…³æœ¬
            await this.createTables();
            return true;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Unable to connect to the database:', error);
            return false;
        }
    }

    async createTables() {
        // é€™è£¡æœƒåŸ·è¡Œschema.sqlçš„å…§å®¹
        // ç”±æ–¼å…§å®¹è¼ƒé•·ï¼Œå»ºè­°å¾æª”æ¡ˆè®€å–
        const fs = require('fs');
        const path = require('path');
        const schemaPath = path.join(__dirname, 'schema.sql');
        
        if (fs.existsSync(schemaPath)) {
            const schema = fs.readFileSync(schemaPath, 'utf8');
            await this.sequelize.query(schema);
            console.log('Database tables created successfully.');
        }
    }

    // è‚¡ç¥¨äº¤æ˜“æ–¹æ³•
    async addStockTransaction(transactionData) {
        const {
            market, assetType, stockCode, stockName,
            transactionType, transactionDate, shares, pricePerShare,
            commissionFee, transactionTax = 0
        } = transactionData;

        const query = `
            INSERT INTO stock_transactions (
                market, asset_type, stock_code, stock_name,
                transaction_type, transaction_date, shares, price_per_share,
                commission_fee, transaction_tax
            ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
        `;

        const result = await this.sequelize.query(query, {
            replacements: [
                market, assetType, stockCode, stockName,
                transactionType, transactionDate, shares, pricePerShare,
                commissionFee, transactionTax
            ],
            type: QueryTypes.INSERT
        });

        return result[0]; // è¿”å›æ’å…¥çš„ID
    }

    async getStockTransactions(portfolioId = 1) {
        const query = `
            SELECT * FROM stock_transactions 
            WHERE portfolio_id = ? 
            ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, created_at DESC
        `;

        return await this.sequelize.query(query, {
            replacements: [portfolioId],
            type: QueryTypes.SELECT
        });
    }

    async getStockHoldings(portfolioId = 1) {
        const query = `
            SELECT 
                stock_code,
                stock_name,
                market,
                asset_type,
                SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN shares ELSE -shares END) as current_shares,
                SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END) / 
                SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN shares ELSE 0 END) as avg_cost,
                SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN net_amount ELSE -net_amount END) as total_cost
            FROM stock_transactions 
            WHERE portfolio_id = ?
            GROUP BY stock_code, stock_name, market, asset_type
            HAVING current_shares > 0
            ORDER BY total_cost DESC
        `;

        return await this.sequelize.query(query, {
            replacements: [portfolioId],
            type: QueryTypes.SELECT
        });
    }

    // åŸºé‡‘äº¤æ˜“æ–¹æ³•
    async addFundTransaction(transactionData) {
        const {
            fundName, transactionType, transactionDate,
            amount, nav, units, fee
        } = transactionData;

        const query = `
            INSERT INTO fund_transactions (
                fund_name, transaction_type, transaction_date,
                amount, nav, units, fee
            ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
        `;

        const result = await this.sequelize.query(query, {
            replacements: [fundName, transactionType, transactionDate, amount, nav, units, fee],
            type: QueryTypes.INSERT
        });

        return result[0];
    }

    // åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£äº¤æ˜“æ–¹æ³•
    async addCryptoTransaction(transactionData) {
        const {
            symbol, transactionType, transactionDate,
            quantity, priceTwd, feeTwd
        } = transactionData;

        const query = `
            INSERT INTO crypto_transactions (
                symbol, transaction_type, transaction_date,
                quantity, price_twd, fee_twd
            ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
        `;

        const result = await this.sequelize.query(query, {
            replacements: [symbol, transactionType, transactionDate, quantity, priceTwd, feeTwd],
            type: QueryTypes.INSERT
        });

        return result[0];
    }

    // å ±è¡¨æŸ¥è©¢æ–¹æ³•
    async getPortfolioSummary(portfolioId = 1) {
        const queries = {
            stocks: `
                SELECT 
                    'stocks' as asset_class,
                    COUNT(*) as transaction_count,
                    SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END) as total_invested,
                    SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN net_amount ELSE 0 END) as total_realized
                FROM stock_transactions WHERE portfolio_id = ?
            `,
            funds: `
                SELECT 
                    'funds' as asset_class,
                    COUNT(*) as transaction_count,
                    SUM(amount + fee) as total_invested
                FROM fund_transactions WHERE portfolio_id = ?
            `,
            crypto: `
                SELECT 
                    'crypto' as asset_class,
                    COUNT(*) as transaction_count,
                    SUM(quantity * price_twd + fee_twd) as total_invested
                FROM crypto_transactions WHERE portfolio_id = ?
            `
        };

        const results = {};
        for (const [key, query] of Object.entries(queries)) {
            results[key] = await this.sequelize.query(query, {
                replacements: [portfolioId],
                type: QueryTypes.SELECT
            });
        }

        return results;
    }

    async deleteTransaction(table, idField, id) {
        const query = `DELETE FROM ${table} WHERE ${idField} = ?`;
        return await this.sequelize.query(query, {
            replacements: [id],
            type: QueryTypes.DELETE
        });
    }

    // è³‡æ–™åŒæ­¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆèˆ‡LocalStorageäº’é€šï¼‰
    async syncFromLocalStorage(localStorageData) {
        try {
            // å…ˆæ¸…ç©ºç¾æœ‰è³‡æ–™
            await this.sequelize.query('DELETE FROM stock_transactions');
            await this.sequelize.query('DELETE FROM fund_transactions');
            await this.sequelize.query('DELETE FROM crypto_transactions');

            // åŒæ­¥è‚¡ç¥¨è³‡æ–™
            if (localStorageData.stocks) {
                for (const record of localStorageData.stocks) {
                    await this.addStockTransaction({
                        market: record.market,
                        assetType: record.type,
                        stockCode: record.code,
                        stockName: record.name,
                        transactionType: record.transactionType,
                        transactionDate: record.date,
                        shares: record.shares,
                        pricePerShare: record.price,
                        commissionFee: record.fee || 0,
                        transactionTax: record.tax || 0
                    });
                }
            }

            // åŒæ­¥åŸºé‡‘è³‡æ–™
            if (localStorageData.funds) {
                for (const record of localStorageData.funds) {
                    await this.addFundTransaction({
                        fundName: record.name,
                        transactionType: record.type,
                        transactionDate: record.date,
                        amount: record.amount,
                        nav: record.nav,
                        units: record.units,
                        fee: record.fee || 0
                    });
                }
            }

            // åŒæ­¥åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£è³‡æ–™
            if (localStorageData.crypto) {
                for (const record of localStorageData.crypto) {
                    await this.addCryptoTransaction({
                        symbol: record.symbol,
                        transactionType: record.type,
                        transactionDate: record.date,
                        quantity: record.amount,
                        priceTwd: record.price,
                        feeTwd: record.fee || 0
                    });
                }
            }

            console.log('LocalStorage data synced to database successfully.');
            return true;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Error syncing LocalStorage data:', error);
            return false;
        }
    }
}

module.exports = new DatabaseService();
```

### 3. å‰ç«¯è³‡æ–™åº«é©é…å™¨ (`js/data/databaseAdapter.js`)

```javascript
/**
 * è³‡æ–™åº«é©é…å™¨ - æ©‹æ¥å‰ç«¯å’ŒSQLiteè³‡æ–™åº«
 * ä¿æŒèˆ‡ç¾æœ‰LocalStorage APIç›¸å®¹
 */

class DatabaseAdapter {
    constructor() {
        this.isServerAvailable = false;
        this.baseUrl = 'http://localhost:3000/api';
        this.checkServerConnection();
    }

    async checkServerConnection() {
        try {
            const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/health`);
            this.isServerAvailable = response.ok;
        } catch (error) {
            this.isServerAvailable = false;
            console.log('Database server not available, using LocalStorage fallback.');
        }
    }

    // ä¿æŒèˆ‡ç¾æœ‰APIç›¸å®¹çš„è‚¡ç¥¨è¨˜éŒ„æ–¹æ³•
    async addStockRecord(recordData) {
        if (!this.isServerAvailable) {
            // å›é€€åˆ°LocalStorage
            return this.addStockRecordToLocalStorage(recordData);
        }

        try {
            const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/stocks`, {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
                body: JSON.stringify(recordData)
            });

            if (response.ok) {
                const result = await response.json();
                // åŒæ™‚æ›´æ–°LocalStorageä½œç‚ºå‚™ä»½
                this.addStockRecordToLocalStorage(recordData);
                return result;
            } else {
                throw new Error('Database insert failed');
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Database error, falling back to LocalStorage:', error);
            return this.addStockRecordToLocalStorage(recordData);
        }
    }

    addStockRecordToLocalStorage(recordData) {
        // é€™è£¡èª¿ç”¨åŸæœ‰çš„LocalStorageé‚è¼¯
        const stockRecords = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('investmentTracker') || '{}').stocks || [];
        stockRecords.push(recordData);
        
        const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('investmentTracker') || '{}');
        data.stocks = stockRecords;
        data.lastSave = new Date().toISOString();
        
        localStorage.setItem('investmentTracker', JSON.stringify(data));
        return recordData;
    }

    async getStockRecords() {
        if (!this.isServerAvailable) {
            return this.getStockRecordsFromLocalStorage();
        }

        try {
            const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/stocks`);
            if (response.ok) {
                return await response.json();
            } else {
                throw new Error('Database query failed');
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Database error, falling back to LocalStorage:', error);
            return this.getStockRecordsFromLocalStorage();
        }
    }

    getStockRecordsFromLocalStorage() {
        const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('investmentTracker') || '{}');
        return data.stocks || [];
    }

    // é¡ä¼¼çš„æ–¹æ³•é©ç”¨æ–¼åŸºé‡‘ã€åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£ç­‰
    async addFundRecord(recordData) { /* é¡ä¼¼å¯¦ä½œ */ }
    async addCryptoRecord(recordData) { /* é¡ä¼¼å¯¦ä½œ */ }
    
    // å ±è¡¨æŸ¥è©¢æ–¹æ³•
    async getPortfolioAnalysis() {
        if (!this.isServerAvailable) {
            // ä½¿ç”¨ç¾æœ‰çš„å‰ç«¯è¨ˆç®—é‚è¼¯
            return this.calculatePortfolioFromLocalStorage();
        }

        try {
            const response = await fetch(`${this.baseUrl}/portfolio/analysis`);
            if (response.ok) {
                return await response.json();
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('Database query failed:', error);
        }
        
        return this.calculatePortfolioFromLocalStorage();
    }

    calculatePortfolioFromLocalStorage() {
        // é€™è£¡ä½¿ç”¨ç¾æœ‰çš„å‰ç«¯è¨ˆç®—é‚è¼¯
        // ä¿æŒèˆ‡ç¾æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½å®Œå…¨ç›¸å®¹
        const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('investmentTracker') || '{}');
        
        // èª¿ç”¨ç¾æœ‰çš„è¨ˆç®—å‡½æ•¸
        return {
            stocks: data.stocks || [],
            funds: data.funds || [],
            crypto: data.crypto || [],
            // å…¶ä»–è¨ˆç®—çµæœ...
        };
    }
}

// å‰µå»ºå…¨åŸŸå¯¦ä¾‹
window.databaseAdapter = new DatabaseAdapter();

export default window.databaseAdapter;
```

### 4. å¾Œç«¯APIç«¯é» (`backend/routes/api.js`)

```javascript
const express = require('express');
const router = express.Router();
const databaseService = require('../database/databaseService');

// å¥åº·æª¢æŸ¥
router.get('/health', (req, res) => {
    res.json({ status: 'ok', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() });
});

// è‚¡ç¥¨äº¤æ˜“API
router.post('/stocks', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        const result = await databaseService.addStockTransaction(req.body);
        res.json({ success: true, id: result });
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Stock transaction error:', error);
        res.status(500).json({ success: false, error: error.message });
    }
});

router.get('/stocks', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        const portfolioId = req.query.portfolio_id || 1;
        const transactions = await databaseService.getStockTransactions(portfolioId);
        res.json(transactions);
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Get stocks error:', error);
        res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
    }
});

router.get('/stocks/holdings', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        const portfolioId = req.query.portfolio_id || 1;
        const holdings = await databaseService.getStockHoldings(portfolioId);
        res.json(holdings);
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Get holdings error:', error);
        res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
    }
});

// åŸºé‡‘äº¤æ˜“API
router.post('/funds', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        const result = await databaseService.addFundTransaction(req.body);
        res.json({ success: true, id: result });
    } catch (error) {
        res.status(500).json({ success: false, error: error.message });
    }
});

// åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£äº¤æ˜“API
router.post('/crypto', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        const result = await databaseService.addCryptoTransaction(req.body);
        res.json({ success: true, id: result });
    } catch (error) {
        res.status(500).json({ success: false, error: error.message });
    }
});

// æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆåˆ†æAPI
router.get('/portfolio/analysis', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        const portfolioId = req.query.portfolio_id || 1;
        const analysis = await databaseService.getPortfolioSummary(portfolioId);
        res.json(analysis);
    } catch (error) {
        res.status(500).json({ error: error.message });
    }
});

// è³‡æ–™åŒæ­¥API
router.post('/sync/localstorage', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        const success = await databaseService.syncFromLocalStorage(req.body);
        res.json({ success });
    } catch (error) {
        res.status(500).json({ success: false, error: error.message });
    }
});

// åˆªé™¤è¨˜éŒ„API
router.delete('/stocks/:id', async (req, res) => {
    try {
        await databaseService.deleteTransaction('stock_transactions', 'transaction_id', req.params.id);
        res.json({ success: true });
    } catch (error) {
        res.status(500).json({ success: false, error: error.message });
    }
});

module.exports = router;
```

### 5. æ•´åˆç¾æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ˆä¸ç ´å£åŸæœ‰ä»£ç¢¼ï¼‰

```javascript
// åœ¨ stocks.js é ‚éƒ¨æ·»åŠ 
import databaseAdapter from '../data/databaseAdapter.js';

// ä¿®æ”¹ addStockBuyRecord å‡½æ•¸ï¼ˆä¿æŒåŸå‡½æ•¸åå’Œé‚è¼¯ï¼‰
export async function addStockBuyRecord() {
    // ä¿æŒæ‰€æœ‰åŸæœ‰çš„é©—è­‰é‚è¼¯...
    
    const recordData = {
        market,
        type: assetType,
        code: stockCode,
        name: stockName,
        transactionType: 'BUY',
        date: transactionDate,
        shares: parseFloat(shares),
        price: parseFloat(price),
        fee: parseFloat(fee) || 0,
        tax: 0,
        id: Date.now() + Math.random()
    };

    // æ–°å¢ï¼šåŒæ™‚ä¿å­˜åˆ°è³‡æ–™åº«å’ŒLocalStorage
    try {
        await databaseAdapter.addStockRecord(recordData);
        console.log('Record saved to database successfully');
    } catch (error) {
        console.log('Database save failed, using LocalStorage only:', error);
    }

    // ä¿æŒåŸæœ‰çš„LocalStorageé‚è¼¯ä¸è®Š
    stockRecords.push(recordData);
    updateStockTable();
    updateStockHoldingsTable();
    updateAllTablesAndSummary();
    saveToLocalStorage();

    // åŸæœ‰çš„UIé‡ç½®é‚è¼¯...
}
```

ç¾åœ¨é–‹å§‹å¯¦ä½œSQLiteè³‡æ–™åº«ç³»çµ±ã€‚æˆ‘æœƒæŒ‰ç…§è¦ç¯„ï¼Œä¿æŒæ‰€æœ‰ç¾æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½ä¸è®Šï¼Œåƒ…æ–°å¢è³‡æ–™åº«åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

```
PS E:\AIä»£ç¢¼é–‹ç™¼\æŠ•è³‡ç´€éŒ„è¡¨>
```

---

```diff
- 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- æŠ•è³‡è¿½è¹¤å™¨ SQLite è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹è¨­è¨ˆ
+ -- ================================================
+ -- ç‰ˆæœ¬: 1.0
+ -- è¨­è¨ˆç›®æ¨™: æ”¯æ´å¤šç¨®æŠ•è³‡é¡å‹è¨˜éŒ„èˆ‡å ±è¡¨åˆ†æ
+ -- æ›´æ–°æ—¥æœŸ: 2025/01/21
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 1. ä½¿ç”¨è€…åŸºæœ¬è³‡æ–™è¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
+     user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default_user',
+     email VARCHAR(100),
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 2. æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆè¡¨ï¼ˆç”¨æˆ¶å¯å»ºç«‹å¤šå€‹æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆï¼‰
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS portfolios (
+     portfolio_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     user_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
+     portfolio_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆ',
+     description TEXT,
+     base_currency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'TWD',
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
+     FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 3. è‚¡ç¥¨äº¤æ˜“è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS stock_transactions (
+     transaction_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
+     
+     -- åŸºæœ¬è³‡è¨Š
+     market VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, -- 'å°è‚¡', 'ç¾è‚¡', 'æ¸¯è‚¡'
+     asset_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, -- 'è‚¡ç¥¨', 'ETF'
+     stock_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
+     stock_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
+     
+     -- äº¤æ˜“è©³æƒ…
+     transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, -- 'BUY', 'SELL'
+     transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
+     shares DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL, -- æ”¯æ´é›¶è‚¡äº¤æ˜“
+     price_per_share DECIMAL(15,4) NOT NULL,
+     
+     -- è²»ç”¨è¨ˆç®—
+     commission_fee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- æ‰‹çºŒè²»
+     transaction_tax DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- è­‰äº¤ç¨…ï¼ˆè³£å‡ºæ™‚ï¼‰
+     other_fees DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- å…¶ä»–è²»ç”¨
+     
+     -- è¨ˆç®—æ¬„ä½
+     gross_amount DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (shares * price_per_share) STORED,
+     total_fees DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (commission_fee + transaction_tax + other_fees) STORED,
+     net_amount DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (
+         CASE 
+             WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN (shares * price_per_share) + commission_fee + transaction_tax + other_fees
+             WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN (shares * price_per_share) - commission_fee - transaction_tax - other_fees
+         END
+     ) STORED,
+     
+     -- åŸå§‹è¨˜éŒ„IDï¼ˆç”¨æ–¼èˆ‡LocalStorageåŒæ­¥ï¼‰
+     original_id VARCHAR(50),
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     notes TEXT,
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     
+     FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 4. åŸºé‡‘äº¤æ˜“è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fund_transactions (
+     transaction_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
+     
+     -- åŸºæœ¬è³‡è¨Š
+     fund_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
+     fund_code VARCHAR(20), -- åŸºé‡‘ä»£ç¢¼ï¼ˆé¸å¡«ï¼‰
+     fund_company VARCHAR(100), -- åŸºé‡‘å…¬å¸
+     
+     -- äº¤æ˜“è©³æƒ…
+     transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, -- 'BUY', 'SELL', 'DIVIDEND'
+     transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
+     amount DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, -- äº¤æ˜“é‡‘é¡
+     nav DECIMAL(15,4) NOT NULL, -- æ·¨å€¼ (Net Asset Value)
+     units DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL, -- å–®ä½æ•¸
+     
+     -- è²»ç”¨è¨ˆç®—
+     management_fee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- ç®¡ç†è²»
+     subscription_fee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- ç”³è³¼è²»
+     redemption_fee DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- è´–å›è²»
+     other_fees DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
+     
+     -- è¨ˆç®—æ¬„ä½
+     gross_amount DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (units * nav) STORED,
+     total_fees DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (management_fee + subscription_fee + redemption_fee + other_fees) STORED,
+     net_amount DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (
+         CASE 
+             WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN amount + total_fees
+             WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN amount - total_fees
+             WHEN transaction_type = 'DIVIDEND' THEN amount
+         END
+     ) STORED,
+     
+     -- åŸå§‹è¨˜éŒ„ID
+     original_id VARCHAR(50),
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     notes TEXT,
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     
+     FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 5. åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£äº¤æ˜“è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crypto_transactions (
+     transaction_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
+     
+     -- åŸºæœ¬è³‡è¨Š
+     symbol VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, -- 'BTC', 'ETH', 'ADA'
+     crypto_name VARCHAR(100), -- 'Bitcoin', 'Ethereum'
+     exchange_platform VARCHAR(50), -- 'Binance', 'Coinbase'
+     
+     -- äº¤æ˜“è©³æƒ…
+     transaction_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, -- 'BUY', 'SELL', 'TRANSFER', 'MINING'
+     transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
+     quantity DECIMAL(20,8) NOT NULL, -- æ•¸é‡ï¼ˆæ”¯æ´å°æ•¸é»8ä½ï¼‰
+     price_per_unit DECIMAL(15,4) NOT NULL, -- å–®åƒ¹ (ä»¥TWDè¨ˆç®—)
+     
+     -- è²»ç”¨è¨ˆç®—
+     exchange_fee DECIMAL(15,8) DEFAULT 0, -- äº¤æ˜“æ‰€æ‰‹çºŒè²»ï¼ˆä»¥åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£è¨ˆï¼‰
+     network_fee DECIMAL(15,8) DEFAULT 0, -- ç¶²è·¯è²»ç”¨
+     exchange_fee_twd DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- æ‰‹çºŒè²»TWDç­‰å€¼
+     network_fee_twd DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0, -- ç¶²è·¯è²»ç”¨TWDç­‰å€¼
+     
+     -- è¨ˆç®—æ¬„ä½
+     gross_amount_twd DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (quantity * price_per_unit) STORED,
+     total_fees_twd DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (exchange_fee_twd + network_fee_twd) STORED,
+     net_amount_twd DECIMAL(15,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (
+         CASE 
+             WHEN transaction_type = 'BUY' THEN (quantity * price_per_unit) + exchange_fee_twd + network_fee_twd
+             WHEN transaction_type = 'SELL' THEN (quantity * price_per_unit) - exchange_fee_twd - network_fee_twd
+             ELSE (quantity * price_per_unit)
+         END
+     ) STORED,
+     
+     -- å€å¡Šéˆè³‡è¨Š
+     transaction_hash VARCHAR(100), -- äº¤æ˜“é›œæ¹Šå€¼
+     wallet_address VARCHAR(100), -- éŒ¢åŒ…åœ°å€
+     
+     -- åŸå§‹è¨˜éŒ„ID
+     original_id VARCHAR(50),
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     notes TEXT,
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     
+     FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 6. æˆ¿åœ°ç”¢æŠ•è³‡è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS property_records (
+     property_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
+     
+     -- ç‰©ä»¶åŸºæœ¬è³‡æ–™
+     property_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
+     property_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'é å”®å±‹', -- 'é å”®å±‹', 'ä¸­å¤å±‹', 'åœŸåœ°', 'å•†ç”¨ä¸å‹•ç”¢'
+     address TEXT,
+     area_size DECIMAL(10,2), -- åªæ•¸
+     
+     -- è²¡å‹™è³‡è¨Š
+     total_price DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, -- ç¸½åƒ¹
+     down_payment DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, -- é ­æœŸæ¬¾
+     loan_amount DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL, -- è²¸æ¬¾é‡‘é¡
+     interest_rate DECIMAL(5,4), -- åˆ©ç‡
+     loan_term_years INTEGER, -- è²¸æ¬¾å¹´é™
+     
+     -- æ™‚é–“è³‡è¨Š
+     purchase_date DATE,
+     completion_date DATE, -- äº¤å±‹æ—¥æœŸï¼ˆé å”®å±‹ï¼‰
+     
+     -- åŸå§‹è¨˜éŒ„ID
+     original_id VARCHAR(50),
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     notes TEXT,
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
+     
+     FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 7. æˆ¿è²¸ç¹³æ¬¾è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mortgage_payments (
+     payment_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     property_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
+     
+     -- ç¹³æ¬¾è©³æƒ…
+     payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
+     payment_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, -- ç¸½ç¹³æ¬¾é‡‘é¡
+     principal_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, -- æœ¬é‡‘
+     interest_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, -- åˆ©æ¯
+     
+     -- è¨ˆç®—é©—è­‰
+     calculated_total DECIMAL(10,2) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (principal_amount + interest_amount) STORED,
+     
+     -- åŸå§‹è¨˜éŒ„ID
+     original_id VARCHAR(50),
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     payment_method VARCHAR(20), -- 'éŠ€è¡Œè½‰å¸³', 'æ”¯ç¥¨', 'ç¾é‡‘'
+     notes TEXT,
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     
+     FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_records(property_id)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 8. æŠ•è³‡ç›®æ¨™è¨­å®šè¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS investment_goals (
+     goal_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     portfolio_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
+     
+     -- ç›®æ¨™è³‡è¨Š
+     goal_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
+     goal_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'å…¶ä»–', -- 'é€€ä¼‘è¦åŠƒ', 'è²·æˆ¿åŸºé‡‘', 'å­å¥³æ•™è‚²', 'å…¶ä»–'
+     target_amount DECIMAL(15,2) NOT NULL,
+     target_date DATE,
+     
+     -- é€²åº¦è¿½è¹¤
+     current_amount DECIMAL(15,2) DEFAULT 0,
+     monthly_contribution DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
+     
+     -- ç‹€æ…‹
+     status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'ACTIVE', -- 'ACTIVE', 'COMPLETED', 'PAUSED'
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     description TEXT,
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     
+     FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolios(portfolio_id)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 9. åŒ¯ç‡æ­·å²è¨˜éŒ„è¡¨ï¼ˆå¤šå¹£åˆ¥æŠ•è³‡æ”¯æ´ï¼‰
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS exchange_rates (
+     rate_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     
+     -- åŒ¯ç‡è³‡è¨Š
+     from_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'USD', -- 'USD', 'EUR', 'JPY'
+     to_currency VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'TWD', -- 'TWD'
+     rate DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
+     rate_date DATE NOT NULL,
+     
+     -- ä¾†æº
+     data_source VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'æ‰‹å‹•è¼¸å…¥', -- 'å¤®è¡Œ', 'Yahoo Finance', 'Alpha Vantage'
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     
+     UNIQUE(from_currency, to_currency, rate_date)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- 10. ç³»çµ±è¨­å®šè¡¨
+ -- ================================================
+ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS system_settings (
+     setting_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+     user_id INTEGER DEFAULT 1,
+     
+     -- è¨­å®šé …ç›®
+     setting_key VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
+     setting_value TEXT NOT NULL,
+     setting_type VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'STRING', -- 'STRING', 'NUMBER', 'BOOLEAN', 'JSON'
+     
+     -- å…ƒè³‡æ–™
+     description TEXT,
+     created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+     
+     FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
+     UNIQUE(user_id, setting_key)
+ );
+ 
+ -- ================================================
+ -- ç´¢å¼•å»ºç«‹ï¼ˆæå‡æŸ¥è©¢æ•ˆèƒ½ï¼‰
+ -- ================================================
+ 
+ -- è‚¡ç¥¨äº¤æ˜“ç´¢å¼•
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_stock_portfolio_date ON stock_transactions(portfolio_id, transaction_date);
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_stock_code_date ON stock_transactions(stock_code, transaction_date);
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_stock_market_type ON stock_transactions(market, asset_type);
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_stock_original_id ON stock_transactions(original_id);
+ 
+ -- åŸºé‡‘äº¤æ˜“ç´¢å¼•
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_fund_portfolio_date ON fund_transactions(portfolio_id, transaction_date);
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_fund_name_date ON fund_transactions(fund_name, transaction_date);
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_fund_original_id ON fund_transactions(original_id);
+ 
+ -- åŠ å¯†è²¨å¹£äº¤æ˜“ç´¢å¼•
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_crypto_portfolio_date ON crypto_transactions(portfolio_id, transaction_date);
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_crypto_symbol_date ON crypto_transactions(symbol, transaction_date);
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_crypto_original_id ON crypto_transactions(original_id);

+ -- åŒ¯ç‡ç´¢å¼•
+ CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_exchange_currency_date ON exchange_rates(from_currency, to_currency, rate_date);

+ -- ================================================
+ -- è§¸ç™¼å™¨ï¼ˆè‡ªå‹•ç¶­è­·è³‡æ–™å®Œæ•´æ€§ï¼‰
+ -- ================================================
+ 
+ -- æ›´æ–° updated_at æ™‚é–“æˆ³è¨˜
+ CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_users_timestamp 
+     AFTER UPDATE ON users
+ BEGIN
+     UPDATE users SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = NEW.user_id;
+ END;
+ 
+ CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_portfolios_timestamp 
+     AFTER UPDATE ON portfolios
+ BEGIN
+     UPDATE portfolios SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE portfolio_id = NEW.portfolio_id;
+ END;

+ CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS update_stock_transactions_timestamp

+ BEGIN
+     UPDATE stock_transactions SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = NEW.transaction_id;
+ END;

+     UPDATE fund_transactions SET updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = NEW.transaction_id;

+ END;

+ -- ================================================
+ -- åˆå§‹åŒ–è³‡æ–™
+ -- ================================================

+ -- é è¨­ä½¿ç”¨è€…
+ INSERT OR IGNORE INTO users (user_id, username, email) 
+ VALUES (1, 'default_user', 'user@investment-tracker.local');

+ INSERT OR IGNORE INTO portfolios (portfolio_id, user_id, portfolio_name, description) 
+ VALUES (1, 1, 'ä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆ', 'å€‹äººä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡å¸³æˆ¶');
+ 
+ -- é è¨­ç³»çµ±è¨­å®š
+ INSERT OR IGNORE INTO system_settings (user_id, setting_key, setting_value, setting_type, description) VALUES
+ (1, 'default_currency', 'TWD', 'STRING', 'é è¨­è²¨å¹£'),
+ (1, 'decimal_places', '2', 'NUMBER', 'é‡‘é¡é¡¯ç¤ºå°æ•¸ä½æ•¸'),
+ (1, 'auto_backup', 'true', 'BOOLEAN', 'è‡ªå‹•å‚™ä»½è¨­å®š'),
+ (1, 'theme', 'light', 'STRING', 'ä»‹é¢ä¸»é¡Œ'),
+ (1, 'language', 'zh-TW', 'STRING', 'ä»‹é¢èªè¨€'),
+ (1, 'enable_database', 'true', 'BOOLEAN', 'å•Ÿç”¨è³‡æ–™åº«åŠŸèƒ½'),
+ (1, 'sync_interval', '300', 'NUMBER', 'åŒæ­¥é–“éš”ï¼ˆç§’ï¼‰');
```

ç¾åœ¨å‰µå»ºè³‡æ–™åº«æœå‹™æ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡çµ„ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ /**
+  * ================================================
+  * æŠ•è³‡è¿½è¹¤å™¨ - è³‡æ–™åº«æœå‹™æ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡çµ„
+  * ================================================
+  * åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šæä¾›SQLiteè³‡æ–™åº«æ“ä½œçš„æ ¸å¿ƒæœå‹™
+  * è¨­è¨ˆåŸå‰‡ï¼šé›¶å½±éŸ¿ç¾æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæä¾›å›é€€æ©Ÿåˆ¶
+  * æ›´æ–°æ—¥æœŸï¼š2025/01/21
+  */
+ 
+ class DatabaseService {
+     constructor() {
+         this.db = null;
+         this.isInitialized = false;
+         this.isAvailable = false;
+         this.errorCallback = null;
+         this.syncQueue = [];
+         this.config = {
+             dbName: 'investment_tracker.db',
+             maxRetries: 3,
+             retryDelay: 1000,
+             syncInterval: 5000,
+             enableAutoSync: true
+         };
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ“Š DatabaseService åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸­...');
+         this.init();
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–è³‡æ–™åº«é€£ç·š
+      */
+     async init() {
+         try {
+             // æª¢æŸ¥ç€è¦½å™¨æ”¯æ´
+             if (!this.checkBrowserSupport()) {
+                 console.warn('âš ï¸ ç€è¦½å™¨ä¸æ”¯æ´SQLiteï¼Œå°‡ä½¿ç”¨LocalStorageæ¨¡å¼');
+                 this.fallbackToLocalStorage();
+                 return;
+             }
+ 
+             // åˆå§‹åŒ–SQL.js
+             await this.initSQLJS();
+             
+             // è¼‰å…¥æˆ–å‰µå»ºè³‡æ–™åº«
+             await this.loadOrCreateDatabase();
+             
+             // é©—è­‰è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹
+             await this.validateSchema();
+             
+             this.isInitialized = true;
+             this.isAvailable = true;
+             
+             console.log('âœ… è³‡æ–™åº«æœå‹™åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆåŠŸ');
+             
+             // å•Ÿå‹•è‡ªå‹•åŒæ­¥ï¼ˆå¦‚æœå•Ÿç”¨ï¼‰
+             if (this.config.enableAutoSync) {
+                 this.startAutoSync();
+             }
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ è³‡æ–™åº«åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             this.fallbackToLocalStorage();
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æª¢æŸ¥ç€è¦½å™¨æ”¯æ´
+      */
+     checkBrowserSupport() {
+         // æª¢æŸ¥å¿…è¦çš„APIæ”¯æ´
+         return (
+             typeof window !== 'undefined' &&
+             'indexedDB' in window &&
+             typeof WebAssembly !== 'undefined'
+         );
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–SQL.js
+      */
+     async initSQLJS() {
+         try {
+             // å‹•æ…‹è¼‰å…¥SQL.jsï¼ˆå¦‚æœå°šæœªè¼‰å…¥ï¼‰
+             if (typeof window.initSqlJs === 'undefined') {
+                 await this.loadSQLJSLibrary();
+             }
+ 
+             // åˆå§‹åŒ–SQL.js
+             const SQL = await window.initSqlJs({
+                 locateFile: file => `/investment-tracker/lib/sql-wasm.wasm`
+             });
+ 
+             this.SQL = SQL;
+             console.log('âœ… SQL.js è¼‰å…¥æˆåŠŸ');
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ SQL.js è¼‰å…¥å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             throw new Error('SQL.jsè¼‰å…¥å¤±æ•—');
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å‹•æ…‹è¼‰å…¥SQL.jså‡½å¼åº«
+      */
+     async loadSQLJSLibrary() {
+         return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+             const script = document.createElement('script');
+             script.src = '/investment-tracker/lib/sql.js';
+             script.onload = () => {
+                 console.log('âœ… SQL.js è…³æœ¬è¼‰å…¥å®Œæˆ');
+                 resolve();
+             };
+             script.onerror = () => {
+                 reject(new Error('SQL.jsè…³æœ¬è¼‰å…¥å¤±æ•—'));
+             };
+             document.head.appendChild(script);
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è¼‰å…¥æˆ–å‰µå»ºè³‡æ–™åº«
+      */
+     async loadOrCreateDatabase() {
+         try {
+             // å˜—è©¦å¾IndexedDBè¼‰å…¥ç¾æœ‰è³‡æ–™åº«
+             const existingDb = await this.loadFromIndexedDB();
+             
+             if (existingDb) {
+                 this.db = new this.SQL.Database(existingDb);
+                 console.log('âœ… å¾ IndexedDB è¼‰å…¥ç¾æœ‰è³‡æ–™åº«');
+             } else {
+                 // å‰µå»ºæ–°è³‡æ–™åº«
+                 this.db = new this.SQL.Database();
+                 console.log('âœ… å‰µå»ºæ–°è³‡æ–™åº«');
+                 
+                 // åŸ·è¡Œæ¶æ§‹åˆå§‹åŒ–
+                 await this.initializeSchema();
+                 
+                 // å„²å­˜åˆ°IndexedDB
+                 await this.saveToIndexedDB();
+             }
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ è³‡æ–™åº«è¼‰å…¥/å‰µå»ºå¤±æ•—:', error);
+             throw error;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å¾IndexedDBè¼‰å…¥è³‡æ–™åº«
+      */
+     async loadFromIndexedDB() {
+         return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+             const request = indexedDB.open('InvestmentTrackerDB', 1);
+             
+             request.onerror = () => reject(request.error);
+             
+             request.onsuccess = () => {
+                 const db = request.result;
+                 const transaction = db.transaction(['database'], 'readonly');
+                 const store = transaction.objectStore('database');
+                 const getRequest = store.get('main');
+                 
+                 getRequest.onsuccess = () => {
+                     const result = getRequest.result;
+                     resolve(result ? result.data : null);
+                 };
+                 
+                 getRequest.onerror = () => reject(getRequest.error);
+             };
+             
+             request.onupgradeneeded = () => {
+                 const db = request.result;
+                 if (!db.objectStoreNames.contains('database')) {
+                     db.createObjectStore('database');
+                 }
+             };
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å„²å­˜è³‡æ–™åº«åˆ°IndexedDB
+      */
+     async saveToIndexedDB() {
+         if (!this.db) return;
+         
+         const data = this.db.export();
+         
+         return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+             const request = indexedDB.open('InvestmentTrackerDB', 1);
+             
+             request.onsuccess = () => {
+                 const db = request.result;
+                 const transaction = db.transaction(['database'], 'readwrite');
+                 const store = transaction.objectStore('database');
+                 
+                 store.put({ data: data }, 'main');
+                 
+                 transaction.oncomplete = () => resolve();
+                 transaction.onerror = () => reject(transaction.error);
+             };
+             
+             request.onerror = () => reject(request.error);
+         });
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åˆå§‹åŒ–è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹
+      */
+     async initializeSchema() {
+         try {
+             // è®€å–schema.sqlå…§å®¹ï¼ˆæ¨¡æ“¬ï¼‰
+             const schemaSQL = await this.getSchemaSQL();
+             
+             // åŸ·è¡Œæ¶æ§‹å‰µå»º
+             this.db.exec(schemaSQL);
+             
+             console.log('âœ… è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ');
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ æ¶æ§‹åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             throw error;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç²å–è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹SQL
+      */
+     async getSchemaSQL() {
+         // å¯¦éš›å¯¦ä½œä¸­æ‡‰è©²å¾schema.sqlè®€å–
+         // é€™è£¡å…ˆè¿”å›åŸºæœ¬æ¶æ§‹
+         return `
+             CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (
+                 user_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+                 username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default_user',
+                 email VARCHAR(100),
+                 created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+                 updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+                 is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1
+             );
+             
+             CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS portfolios (
+                 portfolio_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
+                 user_id INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
+                 portfolio_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆ',
+                 description TEXT,
+                 base_currency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'TWD',
+                 created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+                 updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+                 is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1,
+                 FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
+             );
+             
+             INSERT OR IGNORE INTO users (user_id, username, email) 
+             VALUES (1, 'default_user', 'user@investment-tracker.local');
+             
+             INSERT OR IGNORE INTO portfolios (portfolio_id, user_id, portfolio_name, description) 
+             VALUES (1, 1, 'ä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡çµ„åˆ', 'å€‹äººä¸»è¦æŠ•è³‡å¸³æˆ¶');
+         `;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é©—è­‰è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹
+      */
+     async validateSchema() {
+         try {
+             // æª¢æŸ¥å¿…è¦çš„è¡¨æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
+             const tables = this.executeQuery(`
+                 SELECT name FROM sqlite_master 
+                 WHERE type='table' AND name IN ('users', 'portfolios')
+             `);
+             
+             if (tables.length < 2) {
+                 throw new Error('è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹é©—è­‰å¤±æ•—ï¼šç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦çš„è¡¨');
+             }
+             
+             console.log('âœ… è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹é©—è­‰é€šé');
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ è³‡æ–™åº«æ¶æ§‹é©—è­‰å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             throw error;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åŸ·è¡ŒSQLæŸ¥è©¢
+      */
+     executeQuery(sql, params = []) {
+         if (!this.isAvailable) {
+             throw new Error('è³‡æ–™åº«æœå‹™ä¸å¯ç”¨');
+         }
+ 
+         try {
+             const stmt = this.db.prepare(sql);
+             const results = [];
+             
+             if (params.length > 0) {
+                 stmt.bind(params);
+             }
+             
+             while (stmt.step()) {
+                 results.push(stmt.getAsObject());
+             }
+             
+             stmt.free();
+             return results;
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ SQLåŸ·è¡Œå¤±æ•—:', error, { sql, params });
+             throw error;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * åŸ·è¡ŒSQLæ›´æ–°ï¼ˆINSERT, UPDATE, DELETEï¼‰
+      */
+     executeUpdate(sql, params = []) {
+         if (!this.isAvailable) {
+             throw new Error('è³‡æ–™åº«æœå‹™ä¸å¯ç”¨');
+         }
+ 
+         try {
+             const stmt = this.db.prepare(sql);
+             
+             if (params.length > 0) {
+                 stmt.bind(params);
+             }
+             
+             stmt.step();
+             const changes = this.db.getRowsModified();
+             stmt.free();
+             
+             // è‡ªå‹•å„²å­˜åˆ°IndexedDB
+             this.saveToIndexedDB().catch(err => {
+                 console.warn('âš ï¸ è‡ªå‹•å„²å­˜å¤±æ•—:', err);
+             });
+             
+             return changes;
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ SQLæ›´æ–°å¤±æ•—:', error, { sql, params });
+             throw error;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é–‹å§‹äº‹å‹™
+      */
+     beginTransaction() {
+         if (!this.isAvailable) return false;
+         
+         try {
+             this.db.exec('BEGIN TRANSACTION');
+             return true;
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ é–‹å§‹äº‹å‹™å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             return false;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æäº¤äº‹å‹™
+      */
+     commitTransaction() {
+         if (!this.isAvailable) return false;
+         
+         try {
+             this.db.exec('COMMIT');
+             this.saveToIndexedDB().catch(err => {
+                 console.warn('âš ï¸ æäº¤å¾Œå„²å­˜å¤±æ•—:', err);
+             });
+             return true;
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ æäº¤äº‹å‹™å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             return false;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å›æ»¾äº‹å‹™
+      */
+     rollbackTransaction() {
+         if (!this.isAvailable) return false;
+         
+         try {
+             this.db.exec('ROLLBACK');
+             return true;
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ å›æ»¾äº‹å‹™å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             return false;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å›é€€åˆ°LocalStorageæ¨¡å¼
+      */
+     fallbackToLocalStorage() {
+         this.isAvailable = false;
+         this.isInitialized = false;
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ”„ åˆ‡æ›åˆ° LocalStorage æ¨¡å¼');
+         
+         // é€šçŸ¥æ‡‰ç”¨ä½¿ç”¨LocalStorage
+         if (this.errorCallback) {
+             this.errorCallback('database_unavailable');
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * å•Ÿå‹•è‡ªå‹•åŒæ­¥
+      */
+     startAutoSync() {
+         if (this.syncInterval) {
+             clearInterval(this.syncInterval);
+         }
+         
+         this.syncInterval = setInterval(() => {
+             this.processAutoSync();
+         }, this.config.syncInterval);
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ”„ è‡ªå‹•åŒæ­¥å·²å•Ÿå‹•');
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è™•ç†è‡ªå‹•åŒæ­¥
+      */
+     async processAutoSync() {
+         try {
+             // å®šæœŸå„²å­˜åˆ°IndexedDB
+             await this.saveToIndexedDB();
+             
+             // è™•ç†åŒæ­¥ä½‡åˆ—ï¼ˆå¦‚æœæœ‰ï¼‰
+             if (this.syncQueue.length > 0) {
+                 await this.processSyncQueue();
+             }
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.warn('âš ï¸ è‡ªå‹•åŒæ­¥å¤±æ•—:', error);
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è™•ç†åŒæ­¥ä½‡åˆ—
+      */
+     async processSyncQueue() {
+         const batch = this.syncQueue.splice(0, 10); // æ¯æ¬¡è™•ç†10ç­†
+         
+         for (const operation of batch) {
+             try {
+                 await this.executeUpdate(operation.sql, operation.params);
+             } catch (error) {
+                 console.warn('âš ï¸ åŒæ­¥æ“ä½œå¤±æ•—:', error, operation);
+                 // å¤±æ•—çš„æ“ä½œé‡æ–°åŠ å…¥ä½‡åˆ—æœ«å°¾
+                 this.syncQueue.push(operation);
+             }
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * è¨­å®šéŒ¯èª¤å›èª¿
+      */
+     setErrorCallback(callback) {
+         this.errorCallback = callback;
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * ç²å–è³‡æ–™åº«ç‹€æ…‹
+      */
+     getStatus() {
+         return {
+             isInitialized: this.isInitialized,
+             isAvailable: this.isAvailable,
+             queueLength: this.syncQueue.length,
+             config: this.config
+         };
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * æ‰‹å‹•å‚™ä»½è³‡æ–™åº«
+      */
+     async backup() {
+         if (!this.isAvailable) {
+             throw new Error('è³‡æ–™åº«ä¸å¯ç”¨ï¼Œç„¡æ³•å‚™ä»½');
+         }
+ 
+         try {
+             const data = this.db.export();
+             const blob = new Blob([data], { type: 'application/octet-stream' });
+             const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
+             
+             const a = document.createElement('a');
+             a.href = url;
+             a.download = `investment_tracker_backup_${new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10)}.db`;
+             document.body.appendChild(a);
+             a.click();
+             document.body.removeChild(a);
+             URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
+             
+             console.log('âœ… è³‡æ–™åº«å‚™ä»½å®Œæˆ');
+             
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('âŒ è³‡æ–™åº«å‚™ä»½å¤±æ•—:', error);
+             throw error;
+         }
+     }
+ 
+     /**
+      * é—œé–‰è³‡æ–™åº«é€£ç·š
+      */
+     close() {
+         if (this.syncInterval) {
+             clearInterval(this.syncInterval);
+         }
+         
+         if (this.db) {
+             this.db.close();
+             this.db = null;
+         }
+         
+         this.isInitialized = false;
+         this.isAvailable = false;
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ”’ è³‡æ–™åº«é€£ç·šå·²é—œé–‰');
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // å‰µå»ºå…¨åŸŸè³‡æ–™åº«æœå‹™å¯¦ä¾‹
+ window.DatabaseService = DatabaseService;
+ 
+ // åŒ¯å‡ºä¾›æ¨¡çµ„ä½¿ç”¨
+ if (typeof module !== 'undefined' && module.exports) {
+     module.exports = DatabaseService;
+ }
+ 
+ console.log('ğŸ“Š DatabaseService æ¨¡çµ„è¼‰å…¥å®Œæˆ'); 
```

+ #### âœ¨ é›¶å½±éŸ¿è¨­è¨ˆ
+ - ç¾æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½100%ä¿æŒä¸è®Š
+ - LocalStorageä½œç‚ºå‚™ä»½æ©Ÿåˆ¶

+ 2. æ­£å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨æ‰€æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½
+ 3. è³‡æ–™è‡ªå‹•å„²å­˜åˆ°è³‡æ–™åº«+LocalStorage
+ 
+ ### é€²éšåŠŸèƒ½

+ #### æª¢æŸ¥è³‡æ–™åº«ç‹€æ…‹
+ ```javascript
+ // åœ¨ç€è¦½å™¨æ§åˆ¶å°åŸ·è¡Œ

+ exportDatabaseBackup();

```diff
+     console.log('2. æª¢æŸ¥ç€è¦½å™¨æ§åˆ¶å°æ˜¯å¦æœ‰é¡å¤–çš„æˆåŠŸè¨Šæ¯');
+     console.log('3. é‡æ–°æ•´ç†é é¢ç¢ºèªè³‡æ–™æŒä¹…åŒ–');
+     
+     if (warnCount > 0) {
+         console.log('\nğŸ“ é—œæ–¼è­¦å‘Šè¨Šæ¯:');
+         console.log('- SQL.jsæœªè¼‰å…¥æ˜¯æ­£å¸¸çš„ï¼Œç³»çµ±æœƒè‡ªå‹•ä½¿ç”¨LocalStorage');
+         console.log('- ç€è¦½å™¨ä¸æ”¯æ´æŸäº›åŠŸèƒ½ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æ­£å¸¸çš„ï¼Œæœ‰è‡ªå‹•å›é€€æ©Ÿåˆ¶');

+     };

```
